summary:
- **Drilling permits received** for Horse Heaven Project (Idaho, USA); Phase 1 drilling (up to 20 holes, ~20,000 feet) to commence **August 2025**, targeting Golden Gate area.  
- **Acquisition condition completed**: Vendor exercised option to acquire 100% of Horse Heaven Project owner; remaining conditions are due diligence and shareholder approval (GM: **25 July 2025**).  
- **Escrow release**: 12.5M shares to be released **17 July 2025** (early); 5M RMLOC options released **31 July 2025**; 81.96M RMLO options expire **31 July 2025**.  

*Material catalyst*: Drilling commencement and GM outcome could impact valuation.
